::: {#hero-heading}
I am an Associate Professor at the [Department of Political Science](http://www.uh.edu/class/political-science/) and the [Hobby School of Public Affairs](https://www.uh.edu/hobby/) at the [University of Houston](http://www.uh.edu/).

The major parts of my research agenda are linked above. You can find my [Google Scholar citations here](https://scholar.google.com/citations?hl=en&user=ShUul74AAAAJ), and [my SSRN page here](http://ssrn.com/author=858121) (with my working papers).

Visit my [Dataverse](https://dataverse.harvard.edu/dataverse/bshor), which has my state legislative ideology data for all 50 states–at the state and individual legislator level–for 1993-2022.

:::
